description: A fresher approach to text advertising.
overview:
Affinity is a response-driven, text-based advertising network that helps advertisers & brands connect with their target audience through its partnerships with over 25,000 premium online publishers. Affinity’s network of publishers consists of a mix of proprietary & partner - Search Engines, Toolbars, Domain Parking Sites, In-Text Ad Units, Contextual Banners, Comparison Shopping Engines, Local Business Sites, and other Social Media Applications. Affinity’s Ad Platform enables 75,000+ advertisers/brands to run performance based marketing campaigns on PPC/CPA basis. Affinity delivers over 10 Billion ad impressions each month to internet users across North America, Western Europe, South America, India and Australia.

Affinity is an independent subsidiary of Hostway Corporation - a global leader in providing services over the internet.
